mapper.select: select * from shop where shopId=#{shopId} and shopState!=4
select * from shop where userId=#{userId} and shopState!=4
mapper.insert: insert into `shop` (userid, shopName, shopIntro, shopAddr, shopRegisterFund, shopRegisterDate, shopState) values (#{userId}, #{shopName}, #{shopIntro}, #{shopAddr}, #{shopRegisterFund}, CURRENT_DATE, 0)
